RTCIceTransportSelectedcandidatepairchan.summary: A selectedcandidatepairchange event is sent to an when the {{Glossary("ICE")}} agent selects a new pair of candidates that describe the endpoints of a viable connection.

remarks.para: The pair of candidates is in turn described by an object which contains one representing the local end of the connection, and another representing the remote end of the connection.
Together, the candidates can be used to establish a connection to be used by the , and, by extension, by an .
This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.
